mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_NO , BOOK_NM , BOOK_PRICE , BOOK_STOCK , BOOK_IMG , BOOK_PUB , BOOK_AUTHOR FROM BOOK ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC LIMIT #{paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}

SELECT BOOK_NO , BOOK_NM , BOOK_PRICE , BOOK_STOCK , BOOK_IMG , BOOK_PUB , BOOK_AUTHOR FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR BOOK_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') or book_pub like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') ORDER BY BOOK_NO desc LIMIT #{paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book WHERE BOOK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR BOOK_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') or book_pub like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') order by book_no desc
SELECT BOOK_NO, BOOK_NM, BOOK_DESC, BOOK_PRICE , BOOK_STOCK, BOOK_IMG, BOOK_PUB, BOOK_AUTHOR , BOOK_PUB_DATE, BOOK_ISBN, BOOK_PAGE FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NO = #{book_no}
